<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Lyrma Swampwalker](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2480)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #157: Devil at the Dreaming Palace](/Sources.aspx?ID=45) pg. 54

**Perception** +11; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Gnomish](/Languages.aspx?ID=5), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +9, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 14 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +9 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 38
(currently 30)

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
trident +11 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 piercing

</column>
